scripts.postgraphile:dev: dotenv postgraphile --plugins @graphile/operation-hooks --operation-messages --append-plugins @graphile-contrib/pg-simplify-inflector -n 0.0.0.0 --jwt-token-identifier app_public.jwt_token --jwt-secret asecretfortesting --default-role drew --cors --classic-ids --subscriptions --watch --dynamic-json --no-setof-functions-contain-nulls --no-ignore-rbac --show-error-stack=json --extended-errors hint,detail,errcode --export-schema-graphql schema.graphql --graphiql  --enhance-graphiql --allow-explain --enable-query-batching --legacy-relations omit --schema app_public --connection $DATABASE_URL
